name: Shooting Crisis. 3D Shooter
description:
The best on-rails shooter of the store! Pixel FPS Shooter brings back the light-gun shooter genre from the old arcades to your phone or tablet!

Based on Time Crisis, Virtua Cop, House of the Dead and other on-rails arcade shooters. You can play OFFLINE!

Pixel FPS Shooter will test yout reflexes with lots of different levels and enemies. Jump right into the action and shoot everything. Do you think you have what it takes to face a real challenge?

Shoot, shoot, cover, shoot, shoot, cover, dodge a bullet, reload... and keep shooting! Try to do headshots to double the score!

Music is amazing, so don't forget to turn up your device volume! Also you will get warnings when you get shot so you can dodge the bullet easier.

• Amazing graphics
• Cool action soundtrack
• Very simple controls
• Fun gameplay
• Play anywhere and offline

Download it now and don't miss the NEW CONTENT with the PERIODIC UPDATES.

We want to add more levels, enemies, weapons, leaderboards, achievements, new game modes...

Do not forget to give us a review! It help us a lot!
